mods.abstract: 29; Middle+West; 34; 10.0x40.0; 36; 10.0x40.0; 235; III; 00/00/1864; [first five burials are Lot 34, rest are Lot 36]; Morgan, B. 1832-1894; Vaughn, Virginia 1854-; O.L.V.; M.M. (Motan, Mariah 1834-1867); W.H. (William Houchen 1838-1906); R. Vaughn 1862-1868 (Robert); V.; F.W.; M.V.aughn, 1798-1895 (Macy); A. Vaughn 1778-1868 (Archibe; D.H.; J.H.
